description: An archipelago of massive trees near the Red Line where pirates gather before entering the New World. The Straw Hat Pirates reunite here after two years of separation.

keyEvents.title: Brook's Farewell Concert
keyEvents.description: Brook performs his final concert as Soul King on Sabaody Archipelago before reuniting with the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of Brook's music career and the beginning of the crew's reunion.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hat Pirates Begin Reuniting
keyEvents.description: Multiple Straw Hat crew members arrive at Sabaody and begin reuniting after two years apart.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the Straw Hat Pirates reunite after the timeskip.

keyEvents.title: Fake Straw Hat Crew Operating on Sabaody
keyEvents.description: The Fake Straw Hat Crew uses Sabaody Archipelago as their base to recruit pirates using the real crew's reputation.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the island as a gathering point for both real and fake Straw Hats.

statusHistory.reason: The archipelago continues to serve as a major pirate gathering point

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship built by Franky. The crew members reunite here after two years of separation.

keyEvents.title: Crew Reunion at Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: Usopp, Chopper, Robin, and Nami reunite at the Thousand Sunny and meet Franky who shows his new modifications.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the meeting point for the crew's reunion.

keyEvents.title: Franky Shows His Upgrades on the Sunny
keyEvents.description: Franky reveals his post-timeskip body modifications to his crewmates aboard the Thousand Sunny.
keyEvents.significance: The ship is where the crew first sees each other's growth after the timeskip.

statusHistory.reason: The ship is operational and ready for the New World journey
